posts.post_content:
Payment: Zelle; Paypal; Check/MO.  Free S/H/I.  


***** PLEASE ***** Correspondence ONLY to – [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

In other words – NO PMs –  you can comment in thread, but please email to follow up.


***** This set will NOT be broken up *****


T207 – Near Complete Set – 200 / 206

$ 35,000

Reasonable offers will be considered.  However, commitment to buy will take president over any negotiations.

Missing cards:  Engle, Donlin, Lewis (no emblem), Pelty, Ragan, Saier.

Recruit Backs:

Anonymous Factory 3 – 19
Napoleon – 11

Broadleaf Backs:

Anonymous Factory 3 – 12
Anonymous Factory 25 – 11
Broadleaf – 8
Cycle -- 15

Thanks, Scott
